entry.title: New blog posts and Meetup talk
entry.id: New blog posts and Meetup talk
entry.summary: Recently, we added two new blog posts about the verification of the crypto-currency Tezos:

entry.title: Verification of the use of data-encoding
entry.id: Verification of the use of data-encoding
entry.summary: We added a blog post about the verification of the use of data-encodings in the protocol of Tezos. Currently, we work on the verification of Tezos and publish our blog articles there. We use coq-of-ocaml to translate the OCaml code to Coq and do our verification effort.

entry.title: Welcome
entry.summary: Welcome to the blog of Foobar Land. Here we will post various updates about the work we are doing.
